name: df-eigval
body: |- wceq(cel, cmpt(s0, co(chba, cmap, chba), cmpt(s1, cfv(cei, cv(s0)), co(co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), csp, cv(s1)), cdiv, co(cfv(cno, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2)))))
comment: Define the eigenvalue function. The range of ` eigval `` T ` is the set of eigenvalues of Hilbert space operator ` T ` . Theorem ~ eigvalcl shows that ` ( eigval `` T ) `` A ` , the eigenvalue associated with eigenvector ` A ` , is a complex number. (Contributed by NM, 11-Mar-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
